title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: (Project Product, EP 67006) LIVE Project work based on Launching of the product developed into the market, financial projections and analysis of the breakeven point, Applying for Getting Incubation at IIT KGP, knowledge application of the various subjects of the Entrepreneurship curriculum from launching the venture into its future exits
